div.l: With lokkis blake kempte full fetisly
Daunce he cowde so welle and Iolily
That he was clepid Perkyn Reuelour͗e
He was ful of loue and ꝑparamour͗e
As is the hive full of hony swete
Welle was the wenche that with hym myght mete
Atte eủery brideale wolde he singe and hoppe
He louyd bettir Tauerne thanne the schoppe
For whan there eny ridyngꝭe was in chepe
Oute of the schoppe thedir wolde lepe
Tyll that he alle the sight had sein
And daunce welle he wolde and nought com ageyn
And gaderid a meyne of his sorte
To hop̄pe and singe and make suiche desporte
And there thei set set steuene for to mete
And pleyen atte the Dise in suiche a strete
For in that toune was ther no prentise
That fairer cowde cast a paire of Dice
Than Parkyn cowde and ther to he was fre
Of his Dispence in place of p̉reuite
That founde his maister welle in his chaffare
For oftyn tyme he fonde his box al bare
For sikirly a prentise reueloure
That hauntith Dice riotte or ꝑparamour͗e
His maistir schal hit in his schop̄pe a bie
Alle haue he no parte of the mynstralsie
For thefte and Riotte thei ben conuertible
Alle kan he pley in geterne or rubible
Reuell and treuthe as in a lowe degre
Thei ben full wroth all Day as men may see
This ioilif prentise with his maistir bode
Tille he were oute of his prentise hode
Alle were he snybbid bothe erly and late
